description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Niigata, Japan. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Japan Niigata City Centre Escape near Shinano River
hotels.description: ANA Crowne Plaza Niigata, an IHG Hotel, offers stunning views and a convenient location in the heart of this seaside city. Diverse culinary choices await you in the numerous onsite restaurants, while authentic local delicacies can be found in markets and nearby eateries. As the sun sets, look out over the Niigata skyline with dazzling vistas of neon lights and the Shinano River, while indulging in a cool cocktail from the comfort of the top-floor Sky Bar.
